title: [BUG] signal 11 (SIGSEGV) native crash
body:
**Description**

Hello. Recently I've decided to update my app and I switched app to androidx. I've published my app to google play and see a lot of native crashes (stacktrace below), mainly on Android 11.  The problem is with libSkiaSharp.so, so I guess that there is something wrong with skiasharp. I can't reproduce that error on emulators.

**Stacktrace**

`signal 11 (SIGSEGV), code 1 (SEGV_MAPERR)`

`*** *** *** *** *** *** *** *** *** *** *** *** *** *** *** ***`
`pid: 0, tid: 0 >>> com.companyname.pcgname<<<`

`backtrace:`
` #00  pc 000000000007c8a8  /data/app/com.companyname.pcgname-1/lib/arm/libSkiaSharp.so`


**Basic Information**

- Version with issue:  Skiasharp.Views.Forms 2.80.2 
- Last known good version: Skiasharp.Views.Forms 2.80.2 
- IDE:   Visual Studio 2019
- Platform Target Frameworks: <!-- all that apply, remove the platforms that aren't broken or haven't had any testing -->
  - Android: SDK 30
